user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send out this month'"'"'s company newsletter to me (employees@quantuminnovations.com). Instruct her to consult her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

Could you please send out this month’s company newsletter to employees@quantuminnovations.com at your earliest convenience? When assembling the newsletter, kindly refer to the relevant materials in your Gmail and our Notion workspace to ensure all the latest updates are included.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
(On behalf of all Quantum Innovations employees)

final_output:
